Cone_SteamLance.DescriptionRef: Generate scalding vapors, removing Weakened, Vulnerable, Brittle, and Plague from allies in a 15 degree, 13m long cone, and applying up to Vulnerable III to enemies. Also heals (75 Qualifier) Vitality for 3 turns to allies and enemies damaged by healing, and deals 120% Water Damage to enemies. Source Infusions: 1: +15% damage (+2% per Hydrosophist) while casting. Apply 2 Battered (+0.2 per Hydrosophist) to enemies. 2 (requires 5 Hydrosophist): Apply Armor of Frost, Fortify, and Haste to allies for 3 turns. Apply 2 Battered (+0.2 per Hydrosophist) to enemies. Gain an empowered Steam Lance skill that costs 2AP, for 1 turn. 3 (requires 9 Hydrosophist): +40% damage (+4% per Hydrosophist) while casting. Empowered Steam Lance can now be cast for 4 turns. Allies within 13m of your target, who have at least 1 Hydrosophist try to cast Steam Lance on your target as a free ritual reaction; for each ritual participant, gain +3% damage per Hydrosophist while casting.

Cone_CorrosiveSpray.DescriptionRef: Conjure a torrent of acid, destroying (130% Damage) Physical Armor on enemies in a 35 degree, 7m long cone. Apply Corroding for 1 turn. 2 (requires 5 Geomancer): Apply Disintegrating: Physical 25% (+2.5% per Geomancer) for 1 turn: The Disintegrating target suffers the listed percent of all damage taken (while Disintegrating) again as Physical when Disintegrating expires. Repeat base effects, with Physical damage instead. 3 (requires 9 Geomancer): Disintegrating now lasts for 2 turns. +1% Disintegrate damage per Geomancer. Repeat base effects, with Physical damage instead. Apply Suffocating for 2 turns.

Additionally grants +20% to all resistances.

Projectile_LaunchOilBlob.DescriptionRef: Hurl an oleaginous bolt at a target point, dealing 70% Earth Damage in a 3m radius and summoning a Black Jelly. The Black Jelly deals Earth damage with melee attacks, casts Fossil Strike and Impalement, creates oil surface in a 1m radius as it moves, and creates a 3m oil surface on death. Source Infusions: 1: Black Jelly's damage increased by 15% (+3% per Summoning). 2 (requires 5 Summoning): Upon death, Black Jelly repeats base effects twice, splitting into two which do not split further and do not count against your summon limit. 3 (requires 9 Summoning): Jellies split once more. Jellies can now cast Catagenic Eruption.

Shout_BlindingRadiance.DescriptionRef: Blinding light radiates from you, dealing 40% Air Damage, applying Charged and up to Dazzled II for 2 turns to enemies within a 5m radius around you, and applying Charged to yourself for 2 turns. Apply Fulmination to yourself, which applies Charged and up to Dazzled II for 2 turns to enemies who move within a 5m radius around you, and to enemies within this radius when your or their turn begins. While under the effects of Fulmination you take no damage from Charged, and instead suffer 1 stack of Battered and Harried. Source Infusions: 1: +1 turn duration. Whenever Fulmination pulses, deal damage again. Apply Charged for 2 turns to yourself at the start of your turns. 2 (requires 5 Aerotheurge): +1 turn duration. Pulse 1 more time each turn. Pulses deal double damage. 3 (requires 9 Aerotheurge): +1 turn duration. Pulse 1 more time each turn. Pulses deal triple damage. Apply 1 Harried whenever Fulmination pulses. Recover 1SP.

Shout_InnerDemon.Description:
Apply Inner Demon to yourself, granting [1], +[2] Power, Demonic Tutelage, and Terrify. Demonic Tutelage damages enemies that enter or are moved into a 3m radius of you. Terrify destroys target enemy's Magic Armor and applies up to Terrified III.

Source Infusions:
1: Apply Demonic Tutelage for 3 turns to all autonomous allied summons.
2 (requires 5 Summoning): Apply Inner Demon to all of your controlled summons.
3 (requires 9 Summoning): Apply Inner Demon to all allied heroes in combat.

Shout_Supernova.DescriptionRef: Before casting, gain +40% Fire resistance until the end of your turn. Manifest your relentless fury as a blistering shockwave, creating fire surface and dealing 200% Fire Damage to yourself and characters that you can see in a 5m radius around you. If you die while casting, manifest a shockwave that deals 500% Fire Damage to characters within 8m. Source Infusions: 1: +25% damage (+4% per Pyrokinetic) while casting. 2 (requires 5 Pyrokinetic): +40% damage (+8% per Pyrokinetic) while casting. Recover 2AP. 3 (requires 9 Pyrokinetic): Cast a Supernova that only harms enemies on every enemy within cast radius.

Shout_HealingTears.DescriptionRef: Apply Empyrean Tears to yourself, which applies Regeneration for 3 turns to allies that are not damaged by healing, as well as to enemies damaged by healing, who come within a 5m radius of you. When applied, Regeneration heals (100 Qualifier) Vitality immediately, as well as each turn thereafter. Source Infusions: 1: Grants 20% (+1% per Hydrosophist) missing Vitality regeneration to you while active. While healing characters that are damaged by healing, deal 50% of the outgoing healing as Water damage and apply Brittle for 2 turns. 2 (requires 5 Hydrosophist): Remove 2 stacks of Battered and Harried from affected allies, or apply them to affected enemies. Outgoing healing as Water damage amount is increased to 75% and also deals an additional 75% as Physical. Now also applies up to Terrified III. 3 (requires 9 Hydrosophist): Now chains 2 times in a 8m radius. +1 turn duration. Recover 2AP and 1SP.

Shout_FrostAura.DescriptionRef: Apply Soothing Cold to yourself and allies within 7m of you. Soothing Cold instantly restores (40 Qualifier) Magic Armor, as well as at the start of the affected character's turn. Cleanses Poisoned, Scorched, Suffocating, and Brittle. Source Infusions: 1: Restore 25% (+2.5% per Hydrosophist) Magic Armor on cast. 2 (requires 5 Hydrosophist): Grants 30% missing Magic Armor regeneration (+2% per Hydrosophist). Effect radius is increased to 10m. Grants 1 Harried removal every turn. 3 (requires 9 Hydrosophist): +1 turn duration. Grants 1 Harried removal (+0.2 per Hydrosophist) every turn. Recover 2AP and 1SP.

Shout_VacuumAura.DescriptionRef: Momentarily open a singularity, dealing 100% Air Damage to enemies in a 8m radius around you. Source Infusions: 1: Gain Vacuum Aura for 2 turns, reapplying this cast's statuses to enemies who come within 8m, as well as to enemies within 8m at the start of your turns. 2 (requires 5 Aerotheurge): Instead of previous Source Infusion effects: Gain Vacuum Aura for 3 turns, which deals double its casts damage at the start of your turns and applies Suffocating for 2 turns to enemies who come within 8m, as well as to enemies within 8m at the start of your turns. 3 (requires 9 Aerotheurge): Vacuum Aura lasts 1 more turn, and deals triple its cast damage at the start of your turns. Recover 1SP.

Momentarily open a singularity, dealing [1] to enemies in a [2] radius around you.

Squelched III consumes 7 Harried:
Target loses AP when using movement skills and is Silenced.

Source Infusions:
1: Gain Vacuum Aura for 2 turns, reapplying this cast's statuses to enemies who come within 8m, as well as to enemies within 8m at the start of your turns.
2 (requires 5 Aerotheurge): Instead of previous Source Infusion effects: Gain Vacuum Aura for 3 turns, which deals double its casts damage at the start of your turns and applies Suffocating for 2 turns to enemies who come within 8m, as well as to enemies within 8m at the start of your turns.

Tiered statuses apply up to tier 3 and reduce resistances; see your journal for a full description.

Shout_PoisonWave.DescriptionRef: Call forth pestilential vapors from the bowels of the earth, dealing 150% Poison Damage to enemies and undead self or allies and creating poison clouds in a 5m radius around you. Additionally apply Miasma to yourself, granting immunity to Calcifying in addition to +50% Earth resistance and +50% Poison resistance. Source Infusions: 1: Repeat base effects 1 time at start of your next turn. 2 (requires 5 Geomancer): Repeat base effects 1 time at start of your next turn. Base effect repeats also apply Calcifying for 2 turns. Apply Wither for 1 turn and Calcifying for 2 turns to enemies within 5m. 3 (requires 9 Geomancer): Repeat base effects 2 times at start of your next turn. Repeat base effects 7 times.

Source Infusions: 1: Totems are now created on up to three corpses. 2 (requires 5 Necromancer): Totems are now created on up to five corpses. Recover 1SP. 3 (requires 9 Necromancer): Create two totems per corpse instead of one.

Source Infusions: 1: Create one additional totem at target point. 2 (requires 5 Summoning): Create one more totem at your position and at any controlled non-totem summons you own. Apply Flaming Tongues for 3 turns to totems created. 3 (requires 9 Summoning): Apply Costly Evolution for 4 turns, and Persisting for 2 turns to totems created. Gain an empowered Elemental Totem spell that has no cooldown, for 4 turns.

Incarnate is granted 2SP. 3 (requires 9 Summoning): Incarnate no longer counts against your summon limit. Incarnate is granted Source Vampirism. Recover 1SP.

Additionally, gain +7% damage per Single-Handed while casting and apply Follow-Up to yourself for 1 turn, which causes your next damaging skill to consume it and gain +50% damage (+4% per Single-Handed) during its cast.

This skill counts as a basic attack.

Tiered statuses apply up to tier 3 and reduce resistances; see your journal for a full description.

Target_Bless.DescriptionRef: Apply Blessed to target character, granting +20% Accuracy, +10% Dodge, and +15% to elemental resistances. Alternately, target a surface or cloud and convert it to its blessed variant. If you target a character standing on a surface or in a cloud, that surface and cloud become blessed. Source Infusions: 1: Grants the Curse spell and +2 AP Recovery. 2: Also affects the closest non-summon ally to your target that is within 13m. Recover 1SP.

Pay up to 4 more AP: For each AP you cannot pay in this way, apply 2 Battered and Harried to yourself. Source Infusions: 1: You are left with at least 1AP after casting. Recover 1 SP.

Target_Challenge.DescriptionRef: Goad target enemy into a duel to the death over 3 turns: - You and your target receive bonus damage based on the opposite's Vitality, up to 50% damage at 100% Vitality. - If either of you die before Challenged expires, the other wins, is restored (200 Qualifier) Vitality, and receives +20% damage, (40 Qualifier) Armor and 40 for 2 turns. - If you perform an attack or skill during your turn that does not hit this target in some way, nor repositions you closer to this target, or the challenge expires, you lose and suffer 150% Piercing Damage. Source Infusions: 1: Apply Hasted to yourself for 2 turns. 2 (requires 5 Warfare): Cast Battle Stomp at your target. Apply Deflecting to yourself for 3 turns. Recover 1SP. 3 (requires 9 Warfare): Pay 2 more AP: Also mirror these effects for your target: at the start of each of your turns while Challenge is active, apply Disintegrating: Physical 20% (+2% per Warfare) to the opposing challenge target until the end of your turn. Disintegrating causes the listed percent of all damage taken (while Disintegrating) as Physical when it expires.

Target_Sabotage.DescriptionRef: Apply Sabotage to target character; - The cost of actions other than movement is increased by 1 AP. - Explode a random damaging grenade or arrow on your target. If the target is at or over 100% Poison resistance, poison grenades and arrows will be excluded. - After Sabotage runs out, character gains Sabotage Immunity for 2 turns. During Sabotage Immunity the target is immune to the Sabotage status as well as its grenade and arrow explosions, but Dazzled can still be applied. Source Infusions: 1: Explode an additional grenade or arrow. Attempt to sneak after casting. 2 (requires 5 Scoundrel): +40% damage (+8% per Scoundrel) while casting. Cast on all visible enemies within 13m. Recover 1SP. 3 (requires 9 Scoundrel): +1 Sabotage turn duration. Sabotage AP cost increase +1.

Apply 2 Battered (+0.3 per Necromancer per corpse within area of effect). 3 (requires 9 Necromancer): Repeat base effects. +25% damage (+4% per Necromancer) per corpse within area of effect, while casting. If there are 3 or more corpses within area of effect, repeat 1 more time.

Target_ShacklesOfPain.DescriptionRef: Apply Shackles of Pain to target character. Whenever you receive damage, Shackles of Pain causes the affected character to receive damage of an equivalent amount and type. If the target ends their turn 13m or further away from the caster, the shackles break, ending their effects, but applying up to Subjugated III to the target. While active, Shackles of Pain reduces the effect of your Power attribute by 75%. Source Infusions: 1: Power attribute penalty is reduced by 5% per Necromancer, to a minimum penalty of -25%. 2 (requires 5 Necromancer): Also cast on the nearest visible enemy to your target, that is within 13m. 3 (requires 9 Necromancer): Also cast on all other visible enemies within 13m.

Target_MosquitoSwarm.DescriptionRef: Send forth your vampiric hunger against target character in the form of parasitic vermin, dealing 110% Physical Damage and restoring an equivalent amount of Vitality to you. Source Infusions: 1: +15% damage (+2% per Necromancer) while casting. Apply Poisoned for 3 turns. Apply Suffocating for 2 turns. 2 (requires 5 Necromancer): Apply Swarmed: Deal Physical damage when using a skill, and damage is reduced by 20% (+3% per Necromancer) for 2 turns. 3 (requires 9 Necromancer): Swarmed spreads to nearby enemies within 4m every turn. Swarmed Silences targets for 1 turn after they use a skill, if they have no magic armor. Swarmed lasts 3 turns.

Target_CripplingBlow.DescriptionRef: Debilitate target character with a tremendous strike, dealing 115% Weapon Damage to it and enemies in a 1m radius. Source Infusions: 1: +5% accuracy (+1% per Warfare) and +25% damage (+4% per Warfare) while casting. 2 (requires 5 Warfare): +40% damage (+8% per Warfare) while casting. Repeat base effects. Recover 2AP. 3 (requires 9 Warfare): Repeat base effects. Allies within 13m of your target who have at least 1 Necromancer try to cast Infect on your target as a free ritual reaction; for each ritual participant, gain +3% damage per Warfare while casting.

Target_SerratedEdge.DescriptionRef: Breach target character's defenses and strike them directly, dealing 100% Weapon Damage. Pay up to 4 more AP: For each AP you cannot pay in this way, apply 2 Battered and Harried to yourself. Source Infusions: 1: You are left with at least 1AP after casting. +5% accuracy (+1% per Scoundrel) while casting. 2 (requires 5 Scoundrel): Failing to pay AP no longer applies Battered or Harried. +40% damage (+8% per Scoundrel) while casting. If the target is affected by Vulnerable III, apply Poisoned for 4 turns and Corroding for 1 turn. Source Infusions: 1: +10% damage (+2% per Scoundrel) while casting. Apply Hemorrhage and Acid for 3 turns. 2 (requires 5 Scoundrel): +40% damage (+8% per Scoundrel) while casting. Apply Corroding for 1 turn. 3 (requires 9 Scoundrel): Gain for 3 turns: once per round, when you perform a basic attack, also cast Corrupted Blade on that target.

Attempt to ruthlessly murder target character, dealing [1]. If used while sneaking or invisible, deal double damage and apply up to Ataxia III for 2 turns. If a non-Boss target has less Vitality remaining than the damage suffered during this attack, it dies.

Ataxia III consumes 7 Battered:
Target slowed and is Disarmed.

Source Infusions:
1: +5% accuracy (+1% per Scoundrel) while casting. +25% damage (+4% per Scoundrel) while casting.
2 (requires 5 Scoundrel): +40% damage (+8% per Scoundrel) while casting.
3 (requires 9 Scoundrel): Repeat base effects. Attempt to sneak after casting. If your target dies while casting this skill, recover 1SP.

Tiered statuses apply up to tier 3 and reduce resistances; see your journal for a full description.

Target_Flurry.DescriptionRef: Assail target character with five reckless strikes, each dealing 50% Weapon Damage. Pay up to 6 more AP: For each AP you cannot pay in this way, apply 2 Battered and Harried to yourself and increase Onslaught's cooldown by 1 turn. Source Infusions: 1: You are left with at least 1AP after casting. +5% accuracy (+1% per Warfare) while casting. 2 (requires 5 Warfare): Failing to pay AP no longer applies Battered or Harried. +40% damage (+8% per Warfare) while casting. 3 (requires 9 Warfare): Gain an Empowered Onslaught spell that only requires payment of up to 4 more AP, always leaves you with at least 1AP, and has a 1 turn cooldown, for 3 turns.

Target_DaggersDrawn.DescriptionRef: Devastate target character with an elegant sequence of attacks; execute 5 strikes, each dealing 50% Weapon Damage. Source Infusions: 1: +5% accuracy (+1% per Scoundrel) while casting. +25% damage (+4% per Scoundrel) while casting. 2 (requires 5 Scoundrel): +40% damage (+8% per Scoundrel) while casting. Attempt to sneak before casting. 3 (requires 9 Scoundrel): Allies within 13m of your target, who have at least 1 Hydrosophist or 1 Scoundrel try to cast Ice Fan or Throwing Knife (respectively, Ice Fan takes priority) at your target as a free ritual reaction; for each ritual participant, gain +3% damage per Scoundrel while casting. If cast while sneaking, your strikes apply +2 Battered or Harried while casting.

Target_Equalize.DescriptionRef: Remove all Battered or Harried stacks, whichever is higher, from enemies within 8m, and apply (bypassing the Boss status) its corresponding countertype in equal amount to what was removed.

Target_Charm.DescriptionRef: Assault the minds of enemies within 3m of target point, leaving them beguiled. Subjugated III consumes 7 Battered: Target suffers damage when attacking this status' owner, making it less likely to do so; reduces AP recovery. Source Infusions: 1: Apply 2 Harried (+0.2 per Summoning). 2 (requires 5 Summoning): Enemy totems within 13m of you become yours. 3 (requires 9 Summoning): Recover 1SP. Non-totem, non-boss summons within 13m of you become yours for 2 turns.

Target_Infect.DescriptionRef: Afflict target character with a withering contagion, dealing 150% Physical Damage. Weakened III consumes 7 Battered: Target's damage is reduced. Source Infusions: 1: +10% damage (+2.5% per Necromancer) per corpse within 13m, while casting. Recover 1AP. 2 (requires 5 Necromancer): +25% damage (+4% per Necromancer) per corpse within 13m, while casting. Apply 3 Battered (+0.4 per Necromancer). 3 (requires 9 Necromancer): For each corpse within 13m, repeat base effects on enemies within 5m of that corpse.

Target_ChickenTouch.DescriptionRef: Transmogrify target non-boss summon to imprison it in the body of a chicken for 2 turns, precluding it from using any attacks or skills and causing it to wander aimlessly. When targeting a non-summon character, instead apply 2 Battered and Harried. Source Infusions: 1: Apply 1 Battered and Harried (+0.3 per Polymorph). 2 (requires 5 Polymorph): Cast on all other enemies within 5m. 3 (requires 9 Polymorph): Cast on all other enemies within 13m. Apply 1 Battered and Harried (+0.1 per Polymorph).

Target_FlamingCrescendo.DescriptionRef: Apply Immolation to target character, causing them to erupt into flames when this status ends, or as they die, dealing 175% Fire Damage to characters in a 3m radius. Source Infusions: 1: Base damage of explosion is increased by 40% and now only harms enemies. 2 (requires 5 Pyrokinetic): Also cast on the nearest visible enemy to your target that is within 13m of you. Recover 1SP. 3 (requires 9 Pyrokinetic): Instead of previous Source Infusion effects: Apply Immolation for 3 turns to every enemy with 13m. Each turn after, Immolation detonates, repeating its Source Infusion 1 detonation damage to enemies in a 3m radius.

Target_ArcaneStitch.DescriptionRef: Channel the purifying radiance of celestial realms into target character, healing 35% of Vitality, restoring 35% of armors, and removing 3 Battered and Harried. Cleanses Scorched, Charged, Brittle, Poisoned, Suffocating, Mad, Plague, Ataxia, and Squelched. Source Infusions: 1: Heal 20% of missing Vitality and armor (+3% per Hydrosophist). 2 (requires 5 Hydrosophist): Also cast on all other allies within 13m. 3 (requires 9 Hydrosophist): Heal 2% of missing Vitality and armor per Hydrosophist. Recover 1SP.

Source Infusions: 1: Apply Acid and Bleeding for 3 turns. 2 (requires 5 Geomancer): Apply 2 stacks of Battered and Harried. Apply up to Slowed III and up to Weakened III for 2 turns. Apply Hemorrhage for 3 turns. 3 (requires 9 Geomancer): Cast Earthquake at target point. Apply 2 stacks of Battered and Harried. Apply Wither and Corroding for 1 turn.

Target_CorpseExplosion.DescriptionRef: Detonate target intact corpse, dealing 250% Physical Damage to characters in a 4m radius. Source Infusions: 1: +25% damage (+4% per Necromancer) while casting. 2 (requires 5 Necromancer): Pay 1 more AP: Cast on every unexploded corpse within 13m. 3 (requires 9 Necromancer): Recover 1SP. For 3 turns, whenever a non-summon character dies within 13m of you, you explode it (as per Corpse Explosion); this explosion applies up to Vulnerable III for 2 turns.

Target_BloodBubble.DescriptionRef: Target character consumes blood surfaces in a 2m radius around them, restoring up to (250 Qualifier) Vitality, based on the size of surface consumed. Source Infusions: 1: Repeat at the start of target's turn, for 2 turns. 2 (requires 5 Necromancer): Restore 20% missing Vitality (+4% per Necromancer). If you are standing in Blood, grant +4% Lifesteal per Necromancer for 2 turns. 3 (requires 9 Necromancer): Apply to all allies within 13m. Before casting, create a 3m Blood surface beneath all allies within range. Recover 1SP.

Target_Apportation.DescriptionRef: Replace surfaces and clouds at the target points with a 1m Electrified Water surface and summon two Voltaic Spires for 2 turns. Instead of attacking, Voltaic Spires apply Charged to themselves and to every enemy within 3m at the start of their turns. The effects and damage dealt by the Voltaic Spires uses your own stats instead of theirs. Source Infusions: 1: +1 turn duration. Voltaic Spires also deal 75% Air Damage to enemies within 3m at the start of their turns. 2 (requires 5 Aerotheurge): On cast and on turn start, Voltaic Spires gain a stack of Conduit for 1 turn. Applying Charged outside of their turn emulates the effects of Lightning Bolt on the nearest enemy within 13m, and removes a stack. 3 (requires 9 Aerotheurge): +1 turn duration. Conduit stack amount is increased to 2.

Target_BloatedCorpse.DescriptionRef: Raise target corpse as a volatile monstrosity that explodes on command. This summon does not count against your summon limit. Source Infusions: 1: If Bloated Corpse dies before using Vile Burst, it detonates as per Vile Burst. 2 (requires 5 Necromancer): Gain an Empowered Raise Bloated Corpse spell that has a 1 turn cooldown, for 1 turn. 3 (requires 9 Necromancer): Upon death, summon 0.45 per Necromancer autonomous Boneshaped Skitterers that last for 3 turns. Empowered Raise Bloated Corpse can be cast for 3 turns.

Teleportation_FreeFall.DescriptionRef: Teleport target character (enemies require at least 5 stacks of Battered or Harried), item, or corpse to fall onto a point of your choosing. Your target and others within 1m of where it lands suffer 50% Physical Damage. While out of combat, only players, items, or corpses may be targeted.

Teleportation_Netherswap.DescriptionRef: Swap the positions of two characters. Each round, only a single Netherswap can be used by your party. Source Infusions: 1: Recover 2AP. 2 (requires 5 Aerotheurge): Apply up to Slowed III for 2 turns to enemies within 3m of either target. Gain an empowered Netherswap spell that costs 0AP, applies up to Slowed III to enemies within 3m of either target, is not limited to once per round, and can be cast until the end of your turn. Recover 1SP. 3 (requires 9 Aerotheurge): Empowered Netherswap can be cast for 3 turns.

Teleportation_LastRites.DescriptionRef: Sacrifice your own Vitality to resurrect target non-summon party member, dealing 400% Piercing Damage to you and reviving the target with maximum Vitality. Characters resurrected in a combat round may not act that round if they have already done so.

Tornado_Air.DescriptionRef: A tornado moves randomly across the battlefield, removing surfaces and removing Scorched, Invisible, and Slowed from characters within 4m of it.</font>
Tornado_Air.BaseDescription: A tornado moves randomly across the battlefield, removing surfaces and removing Scorched, Invisible, and Slowed from characters within 4m of it.</font>

Wall_LivingWall.DescriptionRef: A wall of roots up to 7m long erupts from the earth, dealing 80% Earth Damage, applying Calcifying for 2 turns, and up to Slowed III for 2 turns to those caught within. The wall blocks vision, projectiles, and movement, and lasts for 2 turns. Characters caught within the wall as it is created are able to move out of it. Source Infusions: 1: +25% damage (+4% per Geomancer) while casting. 2 (requires 5 Geomancer): Gain an Empowered Living Wall spell, until the end of your turn, that costs zero AP. 3 (requires 9 Geomancer): Gain an Empowered Living Wall spell, for 3 turns, that costs 3AP and has no cooldown.
Wall_LivingWall.BaseDescription: A wall of roots up to 7m long erupts from the earth, dealing 80% Earth Damage, applying Calcifying for 2 turns, and up to Slowed III for 2 turns to those caught within. SourceInfusions.1: +25% damage (+4% per Geomancer) while casting.
SourceInfusions.2: Gain an Empowered Living Wall spell, until the end of your turn, that costs zero AP.
SourceInfusions.3: Gain an Empowered Living Wall spell, for 3 turns, that costs 3AP and has no cooldown.

Shout_ElectricFence_NEW.DescriptionRef: Apply Closed Circuit for 1 turn to the farthest non-summon ally within 13m, granting it +25% Air resistance. Upon casting, and at the start of each of your turns, fire a piercing lightning bolt at every ally within 13m that has Closed Circuit. This bolt deals 140% Air Damage and applies Charged for 2 turns to characters it hits. Source Infusions: 1: +1 turn duration. 2 (requires 5 Aerotheurge): Apply Closed Circuit to 2 additional non-summon allies within 13m. Grants +4% Air resistance per Aerotheurge. 3 (requires 9 Aerotheurge): Apply Closed Circuit to all non-totem allies within 13m. Grants Immunity to Charged.

Ignitions created this way do not apply Scorched.

Shout_AMER_Adaptation.DescriptionRef:
Your armor shifts and adapts to cover your weaknesses; activate Adaptation.
Convert up to 15% of your maximum Physical or Magic Armor to the opposite armor, until their current values equilibrate or reach their maximum; loss occurs from the higher of the two values and restoration occurs to the lower of the two values.
Adaptation is a power that can be augmented through the Ascension feature.

Target_AMER_Storm_Scourge.DescriptionRef: When cast, and at the end of each of your turns thereafter for 2 turns, 8 masses of carrion fall onto the 5m radius, preferring to directly strike enemies once each - any remaining strikes occur randomly within the radius. Each strike deals 32% Physical Damage in a 3m radius to enemies. May be moved once each turn. Source Infusions: 1: Drop a corpse within 2m of target point, dealing 64% Physical Damage in a 3m radius to enemies. 2 (requires 5 Necromancer): Continue to drop one corpse when carrion is dropped each round. Dropped corpses now deal 2x damage. 3 (requires 9 Necromancer): After casting, as a free ritual reaction, allies within 13m with at least 1 Necromancer try to cast Corpse Explosion on different unexploded corpses within the area of effect. For every two ritual participants, drop an additional corpse.

Target_AMER_Storm_Ethereal.DescriptionRef: Erratic projectiles from distant planes bombard a 5m radius around target point. When cast, and at the end of each of your turns thereafter for 2 turns, up to 5 projectiles fall directly upon each of up to 5 randomly chosen characters in the radius, dealing 45% Fire, Water, Earth, or Poison damage in a 1m radius (allies are instead struck with healing energy for (50 Qualifier) Vitality). If there are fewer than 5 characters in the affected area, projectiles strike random points within the radius until all have fallen. May be moved once each turn. Source Infusions: 1: +1 turn duration. 2 (requires 5 Summoning): +3 strikes. Strikes now apply up to Terrified II for 2 turns. 3 (requires 9 Summoning): Summon an Incarnate at target point and grant it Power, Farsight, Warp, and Shadow Infusions; it does not count against your summon limit. Recover 1SP.

Target_AMER_Acclimate.DescriptionRef: Target a surface in range, and apply the corresponding skin to yourself for 2 turns, which grants immunity to some statuses, +40% resistance to at least one element, +4 to the corresponding elemental school, and causes you to bleed surfaces. Water/Ice: Brittle immune, resist Water, +4 Hydrosophist, bleed ice. Fire: Scorched immune, resist Fire, +4 Pyrokinetic, bleed fire. Electrified: Charged immune, resist Air, +4 Aerotheurge, bleed electrified water. Oil/Poison: Calcifying/Poisoned immune, resist Earth/Poison, +4 Geomancer, bleed poison. Source Infusions: 1: Grants +10% (+3% per Polymorph) resistance of the type chosen. Gain spells corresponding to the type chosen: Deep Freeze, Fire Whip, Closed Circuit, Worm Tremor. These spells do not share cooldowns with their counterparts. 2 (requires 5 Polymorph): Grants 10% (+1% per Polymorph) maximum resistance of the type chosen. Grants +5 Perseverance. +1 turn duration. Recover 1AP and 1SP. 3 (requires 9 Polymorph): Grants +4 to the corresponding elemental school. Recover 1AP and 1SP.

Target_AMER_Acclimate.Description:
Target a surface in range, and apply the corresponding skin to yourself for 2 turns, which grants immunity to some statuses, +40% resistance to at least one element, +4 to the corresponding elemental school, and causes you to bleed surfaces.
Water/Ice: Brittle immune, resist Water, +4 Hydrosophist, bleed ice.
Fire: Scorched immune, resist Fire, +4 Pyrokinetic, bleed fire.
Electrified: Charged immune, resist Air, +4 Aerotheurge, bleed electrified water.
Oil/Poison: Calcifying/Poisoned immune, resist Earth/Poison, +4 Geomancer, bleed poison.

Source Infusions:
1: Grants +10% (+3% per Polymorph) resistance of the type chosen. Gain spells corresponding to the type chosen: Deep Freeze, Fire Whip, Closed Circuit, Worm Tremor. These spells do not share cooldowns with their counterparts.
2 (requires 5 Polymorph): Grants 10% (+1% per Polymorph) maximum resistance of the type chosen. Grants +5 Perseverance. +1 turn duration. Recover 1AP and 1SP.
3 (requires 9 Polymorph): Grants +4 to the corresponding elemental school. Recover 1AP and 1SP.

Target_AMER_CorpseMastery.DescriptionRef: Move the corpses of non-boss characters within 4m from a point that you can see to the closest valid points within 3m of you. Teleportation fails if no space large enough for the corpse can be found.

Target_AMER_Cryotherapy.DescriptionRef: Apply Brittle to enemies within target 3m radius, and create 2m ice surfaces beneath them. Then allies in this radius consume frozen surfaces within 2m of themselves, restoring up to (400 Qualifier) Magic Armor, based on the size of the surface consumed, and removing 2 stacks of Harried. Cleanses Scorched, Vulnerable, and Marked. Source Infusions: 1: Allies are granted +5% to Elemental Resistances (+1% per Hydrosophist), and Immunity to Brittle for 2 turns. 2 (requires 5 Hydrosophist): Apply again to all characters within 13m. 3 (requires 9 Hydrosophist): Allies are granted +2% to Elemental Resistances per Hydrosophist. Recover 1SP.

Target_AMER_HorridWilting.DescriptionRef: Deal 100% Water Damage to enemies in a 8m radius. Targets hit suffer 50% more damage as Water if they have no physical armor, and another 50% more as Physical if they have no magic armor. Source Infusions: 1: Apply up to Vulnerable III for 2 turns. 2 (requires 5 Necromancer): +40% damage (+8% per Necromancer) while casting. Additional damage from missing armor is instead dealt when at least 50% of armor is missing. 3 (requires 9 Necromancer): +40% damage (+8% per Necromancer) while casting. Additional damage is instead 150% more. Detonate Brittle on targets hit.

Shout_Derpy_AcidicToxins.DescriptionRef: Apply Acidic Toxins to yourself, gaining +30% Poison resistance, and converting the Poison damage you inflict into Physical with a 10% damage bonus. Shout_MassFeast.DescriptionRef: Feast on your Skitterers within 13m, killing them and recovering Vitality equal to their on death detonation's damage. If 3 or more Skitterers die in this way, summon an Empowered Boneshaped Skitterer at your location. Empowered Boneshaped Skitterer has improved stats, points into Necromancer, Attack of Opportunity, and deals double damage upon dying.
